sentences.en: Lawrence punched a man in a Los Angeles nightclub and was charged with battery.
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯在洛杉矶的一家夜总会里打了人，结果被指控犯了殴打罪。

sentences.en: His boozing, arrogance, and hair-trigger temper have often led him into ugly nightclub brawls.
sentences.cn: 他嗜酒贪杯，傲慢自大，脾气暴躁，这经常使他在夜总会里和别人发生恶性斗殴。

sentences.en: He had picked her up at a nightclub, where she worked as a singer.
sentences.cn: 他是在一家夜总会勾搭上她的，她在那儿当歌女。
